Set-up
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(lme4)
library(broom.mixed)
```

```{r}
getwd()
```

Load data
```{r}
pHH3stats <- read_csv("Data/DataFigure2/w1118pHH3.csv")
```

```{r}
pHH3stats <- pHH3stats %>%
  mutate(
    Weeks = factor(Weeks, levels = c(1, 6))  # Week 1 = reference
  )

pHH3_pois <- glmer(
  pHH3 ~ Weeks + (1 | N),
  data = pHH3stats,
  family = poisson(link = "log")
)

glmm_tidy <- tidy(
  pHH3_pois,
  effects = "fixed",
  conf.int = FALSE
)

week6_row <- glmm_tidy %>%
  filter(term == "Weeks6")

p_val <- week6_row$p.value

stars <- case_when(
  p_val < 0.001  ~ "***",
  p_val < 0.01   ~ "**",
  p_val < 0.05   ~ "*",
  TRUE           ~ "ns"
)

poisson_pHH3 <- data.frame(
  comparison = "6 Weeks",
  model = "Poisson_GLMM",
  estimate_logRR = week6_row$estimate,
  p_value = p_val,
  stars = stars
)

print(poisson_pHH3)
```

```{r}
write.csv(
  poisson_pHH3,
  file = "Results/ResultsFigure2/StatspHH3Poisson.csv",
  row.names = FALSE
)
```
